# init(authenticationCertificateChain:)

**Initializer**

Initializes a request authentication.

## Declaration

```swift
init(authenticationCertificateChain: [SecCertificate])
```

## Parameters

- **authenticationCertificateChain**: A certificate chain that you use to authenticate the requestor.
title: init(authenticationCertificateChain:)
